attributes.action: Treat bike riders the same as vehicle on the road no number plate or finances??
attributes.additional_details: is going on around them, not only do they skip red lights there rude and arrogant the government spent millions to build them there own lanes safely seperated there lane from our lane but they use the road,if a incident does happen they can get up and ride of and could leave damage to your vehicle and there's no way of tracking them down, why is that fair this can help the economy and drivers PLEASE SIGN!!! DO YOU BELIEVE IN EQUALITY WHY US AND NOT BIKE RIDERS THEY ARE A BIGGER RISK THATS FACT!!
attributes.background: Why is it for fair for bicycle riders to constantly violate the law when riding on the road, that any other vehicle has to pay road tax and insurance to drive!! Bike riders drive on the inside and outside of your vehicle they are riding with there earphones in listening to music not aware to what
